name: Mech Battle!
description:
Imagine a time when mechas are everywhere, and you are one of their pilot! Beat your opponent, gain the highest score, and be the best pilot!

Play Mech Battle! A combination between simple RPS mechanic and Fighting-Rhythm game that gives you brand new experience of controlling mechas!

Control:
R takes the Rock out
P takes the Paper out
S takes the Scissors out
